headline: United States Orthodontics Market Research, Treatment Trends & Forecast Report 2025-2033
summary: The United States Orthodontics Market, valued at USD 2.04 billion in 2024, is projected to surge to USD 5.02 billion by 2033, driven by a CAGR of 10.5%. This growth is fuelled by increasing awareness of dental aesthetics, advancements in clear aligners, and a rising demand for early orthodontic treatments among children and adolescents. The U.S. orthodontics market is segmented by products (instruments, supplies), age groups (adult, teen), and end users (hospitals, dental clinics). Key players i
